Articles.Content:
So I've recently purchased KSP, due to my friend's suggestions, and I haven't been able to boot the game to the main menu. So essentially, I get stuck on a black screen before the game loads up, and then that one Steam menu that says 'Shift + Tab to access the Steam community' and then it goes away, sort of, but instead of actually going away, it does one of those card things at the end of a game of solitaire. Yeah, I'm having problems booting to the main menu in general. And before I can even get a loading screen, I get stuck on black screen. Is there any help anyone can offer?

Edited May 25, 2020 by Bob Number 324
We need a wee bit more data to help you.
